Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on Miyazawa’s own life, this film depicts his adolescence in the country, which he spent intensively reading books, and his young adulthood in Chicago, which he spent as a silent Japanese laborer.
